item.title: Website update with new sections
item.description: Just a little announcement today, I have added two new sections to the website: Links and Bookclub.

item.title: Reading
item.description: At the beginning of 2021, I set myself the goal of reading one book a week (inspired by this video).

item.title: New Design and now also in German
item.description: The site is barely two months old and already the first redesign is coming. I didn’t really warm up to the old theme, but luckily Hugo makes it really easy to change the theme.

item.title: Old Computer Challenge 2023 - Epilogue
item.description: So the OCC 2023 ended almost three weeks ago and everyone went back to the year 2023 and to using their modern computers.

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Days 6 and 7
item.description: So the last two days of the Old Computer Challenge went by in the blink of an eye, and not a lot has happened, so I’m putting them together in one post.

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Day 5: Youtube Videos on an iPod Classic
item.description: Note This is only semi-related to the OldComputerChallenge, but I revisited the idea of downloading videos from Youtube and putting them on an old iPod.

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Day 4
item.description: I want to take this post to get out some thoughts about the internet, social media and mental health.

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Day 3
item.description: On this day I was sick, so not a lot has happened, but I would like to still briefly share a few thoughts.

item.title: 82MHz
item.description: Hi, my name is Andi, I go by 82MHz online. Why 82MHz? Well one part comes from my year of birth, the other from the fact that I studied electrical engineering with a specialization in audio and telecommunications… get it?

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Day 2
item.description: Day 2 is coming to a close. Today I was at work all day and so didn’t spend a whole lot of time on my slow computer.

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Day 1
item.description: Okay, Day 1 is almost over, what have we learned? Modern software sucks!! I mean, it doesn’t really, a lot of it is quite beautiful and easy to use, but boy, everything consumes so many resources!

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Preparation
item.description: This year I learned about Solene’s Old Computer Challenge, and I thought hey, I might give it a go!

item.title: Links
item.description: Here are some links I’ve collected over time and that I want to share or simply just remember.
